directions.step: Take me to a park, yard, or field. Anywhere where there's lots of room!
Make sure that there is a fence or other safety barrier so I don't get too excited and run away.
Ask me if I want the ball (hint: I do!).
Under no circumstances should you do the thing where you don't actually throw the ball and hide it behind your back.
Call me a good boy when I bring the ball back.
